# Azure Public Web Application â€“ Requirements

The architecture must include:

- A public entry point for HTTP traffic
- A managed load balancing service
- A compute service to run application code
- An object storage service for static assets

Common Azure services used for this pattern include:
- Azure Application Gateway
- Azure Load Balancer
- Azure Virtual Machines
- Azure Blob Storage
- Virtual Network (VNet)

The design must reflect a realistic production setup.
